text: Marion County is a county in the U.S. state of Mississippi. As of the 2020 census, 24,441 people lived there. Its county seat is Columbia. The county is named for American Revolutionary War guerrilla leader Francis Marion also known as The Swamp Fox. == References == == Other websites == * Marion County Sheriff's Office * Official website of Marion County Category:1810s establishments in Mississippi Territory Category:1811 establishments in the United States Category:Mississippi counties
title: Marion County, Mississippi
